LanguageData.CookMealSalad.label: 烹饪水果沙拉
LanguageData.CookMealSalad.description: Prepares a fruit salad made from raw fruits. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CookMealSalad_Bulk.label: 烹饪水果沙拉 (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealSalad_Bulk.description: Prepares fruit salads made from raw fruits. Produces 4.
LanguageData.CookRoastedMeat.label: 烹制烤肉
LanguageData.CookRoastedMeatCampfire.label: 烹制烤肉
LanguageData.CookRoadMeatx4.label: 烹制烤肉(x4)
LanguageData.CookMealSimple.label: cook simple meal
LanguageData.CookMealSimple.description: Cooks a simple meal from basic ingredients. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CookMealSimpleCampfire.label: cook simple meal
LanguageData.CookMealSimpleCampfire.description: Cooks a simple meal from basic ingredients. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CookMealSimple_Bulk.label: 烹饪简单的食物 (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealSimple_Bulk.description: Cooks 4 simple meals from basic ingredients.
LanguageData.CookMealFine.label: cook fine meal
LanguageData.CookMealFine.description: Cooks a somewhat complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Bulk.label: 烹饪精致的食物(x4)
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Bulk.description: Cooks somewhat complex meals from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Produces 4.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.label: cook lavish meal
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.description: Cooks a very complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Bulk.label: 烹饪奢侈的食物(x4)
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Bulk.description: Cooks very complex meals from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Produces 4.
LanguageData.CookMealLuxury.label: 烹饪豪华套餐
LanguageData.CookMealLuxury.description: Cooks a luxurious meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Some ingredients are wasted as only the finest will do. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CookMealLuxury_Bulk.label: 烹饪豪华套餐 (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealLuxury_Bulk.description: Cooks Luxurious meals from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Some ingredients are wasted as only the finest will do. Produces 4.
LanguageData.MakeTofu.label: 压制豆腐
LanguageData.MakeTofu.description: Turns beans into tofu. Tofu is used in place of meat in meals or can be eaten raw. Produces 5.
LanguageData.MakeVegetables.label: 烹饪炒蔬菜
LanguageData.MakeVegetables.description: Prepares a simple dried assortment of vegetables. Produces 1.
LanguageData.BakePotato.label: 烤土豆
LanguageData.BakePotato.description: Prepares baked potatoes from raw potatoes. Produces 1.
LanguageData.HalfCoconut.label: 劈椰子
LanguageData.HalfCoconut.description: Splits coconuts into two and harvests the milk from the fruit. Produces 5.
LanguageData.CookMealSurvival.label: cook packaged survival meal
LanguageData.CookMealSurvival.description: Cooks a packaged survival meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
